document_data.name: Reiner Trall
document_data.mainbody: '''Reiner Trall''' was a male [[human]] [[ranger]] of [[Daggerdale]] and a captain of the [[Freedom Riders]] in the 1360s DR.
document_data.History: In [[1367 DR]], Captain Reiner Trall led a patrol of men searching for [[Zhent]]ish agents in Daggerdale and trying to prevent a Zhent caravan from reaching [[Dagger Falls]].
document_data.Possessions: In battle, Reiner carried a [[bastard sword]], [[handaxe]], [[light crossbow]], and [[spear]].
